content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of this code segment?

choices.label: The print statement is executed 7 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 4 times.
The print statement is executed 8 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 5 times.
The print statement is executed 12 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 4 times for each iteration of the outer loop.
The print statement is executed 15 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 5 times for each iteration of the outer loop.

content.answer: The print statement is executed 12 times because the outer loop iterates 3 times and the inner loop iterates 4 times for each iteration of the outer loop.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
